name: OASE - Other Age Second Encounter
description: OASE - Other Age Second Encounter is a game with elements of Puzzle, Adventure Game, Dating Sim, and Visual Novel.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 1Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 358 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I'm sure that, somewhere out there, some person will actually understand this game. I am not that person. It doesn't help that you can get a bad ending within two minutes, then have 5+ minutes of unskippable cutscenes before you can try again.
